## DynamicForm.onSubmitFormatter property

A function that modifies the form value when submitted. Use helper function [\_formStateSetter()](./dynamic-forms._formstatesetter.md) for dynamic state, or provide statically.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onSubmitFormatter?: (f: TForm, s: Immutable<Partial<TFormState>>) => Immutable<TForm>;
```
